website_summaries.verdict: The best gaming headset from HyperX that offers great sound and comfort for hours of playing.
pros: Large over-ear speakers are comfortable to wear for long periods of time and bend to the shape of the wearer's ear
Microphone input sounds clean and clear
cons: USB audio connection is difficult to use consistently without getting distortion

website_summaries.verdict: The Kingston HyperX Cloud II is a gaming headset that doubles as an unassuming pair of good-sounding, over-ear headphones.
pros: Works with PCs and mobile devices as well as most modern game systems
cons: Besides the USB sound card, cable isn't detachable

customer_reviews.title: Good, but for gaming, not great
customer_reviews.text: For voice-chatting with your friends, whether it be over Skype or whilst gaming, this is a good headset but where it struggled for me was when gaming. For games like Battlefield or CoD where you need that 3D sound element (to hear people all around you.... creeping up on you, bullets flying around you, etc...) this really struggled. So much so that it made playing games like that a lot harder than it should have been. In the end, I went with a set of Astro A50s and I haven't looked back since - these, I kept for general VOIP.
customer_reviews.author: richieloco

customer_reviews.title: PC gamer & audiophile with a bit of PS4 on the side's choice headset
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headphones, easy to tell exactly where enemies are. 7.1 surround works very well. All frequencies nice and clear, great for music as well as games. Unfortunately the USB part cannot be used with the PS4 meaning yes these can be used when PS4 gaming but you lose the option to mute and adjust volumes etc. Friends say my voice is clearest in the party, they all have turtle beach headsets. If you want PS4 compatibility and adjustability (silly Saw-like voices, mic volume up & down past that of the PS4 menus ability etc), go for turtle beach. If, like me, you want PC gaming/music headset that can be used for PS4, Go Hyper X.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian420

customer_reviews.title: Nice stereo, but the 7.1 surround is a total lie
customer_reviews.text: This sounds good. For classical music etc., NOT just for thumping baselines and explosions, like most people seem interested in. BUT, it's NOT WORTH IT!!! DO NOT BUY. It may even be fraud. I thought I was buying a USB soundcard that took 7.1 input audio channels, remixed them to stereo taking account of ear position vs. channel position, and presented the surround directly to your ears with high fidelity. What I got instead was a two-channel audio device with a button that adds some cheap spatializer effects. Windows 10 will do that for you for FREE with ANY stereo headphones :/
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: ... these for 18 months now and while he is pleased with the sound and fit
customer_reviews.text: My son has been using these for 18 months now and while he is pleased with the sound and fit, the mic has stopped working on two occasions. Both times this has been due to broken wires just after the cable comes out of the headset. As the cable is quite long I have been able to strip it back on each occasion and resolder the connections. Not sure that this is something everyone would be comfortable/able to do. This is a big disappointment considering the price paid for what otherwise seems a pretty robust product.
customer_reviews.author: Sausages

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gaming!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly and came with protective foaming and a small protective bag. Not too heavy, and fits perfectly on the head without irritating you. Comfortable enough to sit on your head for a few hours - I usually have them on for about 6 hours a day. Sound quality is very good and comes with a built in mic set which is adjustable and can be detached and you can control how loud the sound projects. Thinking to buy a pair for my brother for his birthday next month! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Ng

customer_reviews.title: Worth the upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son who is very impressed by the difference in sound/mic quality from headphones costing half the price. Apparently he can hear a great deal more detail and his friends can easily hear him over his mic. The down side is so can the neighbours! As these are the noise cancelling type they prevent him from hearing his own voice, so now the whole street knows when he is on his Xbox. He used to shout a bit before but now......Jeeeeez.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Nonutz

customer_reviews.title: A solid, versatile and good value choice for a gaming headset with top notch presentation to boot
customer_reviews.text: The box and packaging presentation is of extraordinary quality, and the headset doesn't disappoint either! I also have Turtle beach PX500's and I can say the quality of these HyperX Cloud II's compares favourably at more than half the price. I use these with PS4, Xbox1 and PC with no problems. The only issue with them is that the Dolby 7.1 only works with the PC because of the way it plugs into the console controllers. Can't help thinking that could have been solved somehow. Overall, Happy Customer. Also they have lasted 6 months now and still look box fresh; not bad!
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great for PS4, but for PC they are good.
customer_reviews.text: These are OK, I have been using them for over a year but for me I find these are not as good alot of people say. For instance, theres no mute button as the button controls dont work with PS4. Sound quality is good on PC, PS4 they are not great. MIC is not great, people tend to say I sound very far away. So i just tend to use these without mic and use with a different mic. Cannot recommend if you are purchasing for the PS4. For PC i think there are better options for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Slam

customer_reviews.title: Top gaming headset
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is amazing, they feel expensive and fit very well. Took a little messing around on my PC to set the mix up properly. I'll explain below. I had muffled sound quality on my mic. \>right-click the sound button on you taskbar \>go to recording tab double click headset \>go advanced and change the default format to a higher version and apply If you use discord you will need to go to settings>sound and audio> then set input and output to your headset again for people to be able to hear you. hope this helps I can see now why HyperX are highly rated.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Smith

customer_reviews.title: Has very low microphone volume for games out of box
customer_reviews.text: Got this for COD warzone as moved to pc gaming from PS4. Join game. No one can hear me. All saying I sound way low. So I do a quick Google search and so many forum posts about low microphone. You cannot adjust volume on windows as usb driver. I had to instal a 3rd party app called Peace GUI (on top of other app) to increase volume and now it's great. It's very comfortable to wear. Surround sound is awesome for games. And the bass great for listening to music. Just pity the mic let's it down out of the box
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Lack of customer support and lack of troubleshooting guides from HyperX is a real disappointment. Can't recommend this headset to anyone
customer_reviews.text: The headset sound is okay. However, the glaring issue is lack of software support. Every time my pc boots up I have a one in three chance of the headset microphone just not working. If you don't talk to people online then invest in this headset, however if you are social online and talk to people then don't buy this headset. I've tried to microphone in multiple pc's and the same issue keeps popping up, so it isn't just my machine. Lack of customer support and lack of troubleshooting guides from HyperX is a real disappointment. Can't recommend this headset to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Marcello

customer_reviews.title: Great for gaming or music!
customer_reviews.text: These HyperX cloud ii are kinda classed as mid range in gaming headsets and id say they have the best quality audio for games that i've ever heard, particularly with surround sound activated (if you have win 10, try also activating "spatial sound" windows sonic for headphones from your audio options) note if you plug these into a ps4/ps4 pro via usb, instantly hit the surround sound as u boot the console and it will pick up that mode, otherwise it won't work and you will need other workarounds, also they do still sound great plugged into the ps4 controller... also for music they have lovely sounds and tho a tad heavy, still comfy to wear...very good quality kit imo!
customer_reviews.author: LDB

customer_reviews.title: Great Gaming Headset
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a month now and it's been amazing, the sound inside games is amazing, it's extremly comfortable and the mic is very decent quality. I love the ability to turn up both the headset volume and the mic volume and enable 7.1 on the little box. They also send you 2 different types of ear cups so you can choose to fit either material or leather ones depending on your taste and the mic can either be fitted to the headset or set up as a desk type mic. After all my problems with my Razor headset in the first 4 weeks of purchase, this headset has been a absolute godsend, despite being cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Gunn

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality= fantastic - Mic= troublesome
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is fantastic, no issues with the sound quality at all. The fit is fine, although if you wear glasses they still really hurt your head even with the valour pads on. My main issue with the headset is the mic, it works fine but you will often find that no matter how fully inserted the jack of the mic is, sometimes it just doesn't register as connected and then a few minutes later it will pick it up.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel williamson

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this headset for over a week and i think its great. Very lightweight, comfortable and the leather is very soft. Used it for 4 hours straight with no discomfort. Bought it for xbox one call of duty warzone and can pinpoint exactly where the enemy is by their footsteps which is perfect. Only negative thing is that you can only use the 7.1 adapter on the PC. Perfect in combination with the turtle beach tac adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Chantelle

customer_reviews.title: Good headset
customer_reviews.text: After trying mine, my partner bought a pair. He prefers the alternate ear covers which are softer but let in more external noise. The noise cancelling is passive, but it's better than run-of-the-mill headphones. The detachable mic is nice for when I need it. Both the headphones and mic offer good sound quality. The design is fairly sturdy but also padded for comfort. I'm fairly small and was pleased that the smallest setting fit me well, something that can be difficult for finding a good headset. The main connector isn't too long, but it's good for sitting with a laptop. With the full cord length, it's plenty long enough for reaching the computer for gaming and offers immersive surround sound.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Review on the HyperX cloud II 7.1
customer_reviews.text: I haven't gave it max stars as i haven't fully tested everything yet but first impressions is that its a great headset for the price tag. Headset for gaming on a budget then this is perfect and competes with the more expensive ones. This is actually a downgrade as my old headset wire is messed up but i will say that given its under half the price of my other one is that it seems pretty good. I'd say the other style of headsets with the elastic type of headband are better for less head fatigue but this one barely any weight so it will be fine for many hours on end i am sure.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Brilliant Headset to have if you're a console gamer especially as well as PC!
customer_reviews.text: This Headset is unbelievable in performance compared to everything else on the market to this date but the only worry for some people don't know, there's a firmware update for PS4 compatibility for these exact headphones and if you get it the update on the USB sound card (by the way, you don't have to uninstall the driver on the PC like it says on the instructions as it only requires the firmware to be in the sound card), my God this Headset goes from 0 to 100 very quickly if you play really high quality games!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew P.

customer_reviews.title: Too much hype....
customer_reviews.text: Solid build headset. Comfortable. Great for gaming and movies but just average music sound quality. Virtual 7.1 sound working good. I found cheaper model - stinger, with better balanced sound quality for games and music, but with inferior build. It's gaming headset so 4 stars as they are made for gaming but It's very hard to say if you're getting bang for the buck option...
customer_reviews.author: Kris King

customer_reviews.title: a must have headset!!
customer_reviews.text: by far the best gaming headset i have ever bought! the sound is crystal clear, great for both games and music. the build quality is second to none. i can literally sit for hours (and have done many long gaming sessions) and not even be bothered by them as the are super comfy and light, they grip your head to stay on without too much pressure and they dont make your ears hot after extended use. i have owned many "gaming" headsets over the years and can whole heartidly say these are well worth their cost! highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: James B

customer_reviews.title: Broken as soon as it was out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I have had this headset before and it was wonderful, it was bought instore but it broke last month so I had to get one from amazon, so I bought it from this seller and as soon as it was out of the box it had issues, it kept on disconnecting, the mic kept on cutting off, so you couldn't speak for ages and when you could speak it was really bad quality. I think i received a defected product, and it has only taken me this long because I've been too busy to return and write a review
customer_reviews.author: melanie tate

customer_reviews.title: Xbox one users beware!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a headset with 7.1 surround, then hyper X cloud 2 is not what to purchase! The headset its self will work if you connect the 3mm jack straight into the controller but you will not get the full benefits of whats its advertised for! The usb connection for the surround sound is not compatible for xbox, I have tried every sound setting possible to try to get the 7.1 surround sound working, but the console dose not recognise the device when trying to use the feature! I have forked out £80 and ending up with a basic headset! False advertisement, 7.1 WILL NOT WORK ON XBOX!!
customer_reviews.author: James cook

customer_reviews.title: Unless your looking at paying 400+ they are a great headset
customer_reviews.text: I've used these for nearly 3 years and they have tested the time review. Great audio boost if you choose to use for surround sound but it isn't the best for fps games. Long enough wire. Easy to reattach mic. to summarize the best headphones I've used for gaming so far and i guess they will last for some time longer.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: This headset is fantastic especially for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I've had a few expensive headsets, headphones etc over the years some I've spent double the money of these to buy from Sennheiser and Beyerdynamics and Razer, they don't have the sound quality that the sennheisers or beyederynamics had in regards to music and movies, but they are very high quality for the price and perfect for games, it's very modular, feels extremely comfortable, and is extremely loud even at low levels.
customer_reviews.author: E. Rahl

customer_reviews.title: Does not live up to it's reviews
customer_reviews.text: I am shocked by how many positive reviews there are for this headset, the sound quality is alright, but compared to my previous headset (Asus origin pro ) the bass is weak and by default, the treble is overly tinny-sounding. Comfort-wise this headset is also lacking, it clamps way to tight for my head and my ears feel pressed against the speakers themselves which all combined leads to a sore head pretty quickly. The only thing I would say that is good about this headset is its surround sound which is decent by default.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Great headset when it isnt broken
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel and sound of this headset when its not having issue's, and sadly it often has issues. im on my second one hopeing my first was just a unlucky one with its issues, but thats not the case the new one arrived broken got the parts replaced underwarranty but after 3 months the mic randomly only puts out static until i replug the mic and im getting a really annouying popping sound at random moments (happens in a game or while watching a video/youtube) as much as i would love to recommend this headset i just cant
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Top quality for the price tag. Better than many of the more expensive headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Top quality headphones that are sturdy and well made. The sound quality is excellent and easy to use with no issues or PC setup. The headphones would be more comfortable if they fitted over the ear more or offered more padding but are still very comfortable. Better quality is sound is available elsewhere but with obvious increase in price. For the price tag these headphone are unbeatable especially with the use of 7.1 audio on the built in controls
customer_reviews.author: Nathan S

customer_reviews.title: brilliant headphones. 5*
customer_reviews.text: miles better that the Astro A50's i had previously. really well made and brilliant sound quality (A50's had loads of bass and no quality, these are great for everything). mic is clear from the little use ive had with it. The 7.1 virtual sound is ok, works well with music and vidoes. tend not to use it much with gaming as it amplifies everything a lttile much for me. really overwhelmed at the overall quality of the headset compared to the A50's i had which were nearly three times the price. the inline controls work well and light up too in a faint red glow which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: G. Mcfarland

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic all-round headset, iffy virtual 7.1 surround.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headset! Very comfortable, good all-round sound and the microphone is surprisingly good! Only drawback is virtual 7.1 surround cannot replace real 7.1 surround. This is espcially apprent when listening to music with the virtual 7.1. One instrument will become prominent and overpower the rest of the music. Save the virtual 7.1 for games only. Headset comes with extra earpads, and a very nice carry bag. Removable microphone is a great feature, and the extension cable is very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Hissing, so much hissing
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately despite all of its great features and comfort this headset drastically fails to deliver consistent audio quality. A distinct hissing sound that gets louder with stronger audio sources is constantly heard. It would seem it is a failing from the cheap DAC in the usb dongle. After browsing the net for a solution it appears to be a known problem. The sound gives me a headache after prolonged use. I do not recommend this product for people that are sensitive to this type of issue. Instead go for the Cloud that doesn't have a USB DAC.
customer_reviews.author: T30

customer_reviews.title: Great for gaming, not great for the rest
customer_reviews.text: This headset is great for gaming due to crisp and involving sound. Nevertheless hearing music or movies is pretty sub-standard. I had a sennheiser previously so I could notice the downgrade. To be fair this headset is classified as "gaming" so I won't penalise it much for it. For its purpose is really good and I am pleased with the purchase. I will just switch to speakers if I want to hear music.
customer_reviews.author: F. Rodrigues

customer_reviews.title: Good but needs a mic and eq tweak
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable headphones and good sound quality. The sound definitely needs a major tweak on the eq. You can download a free eq tweak program as the treble is shockingly high. The mic is a bit low but that also just needs a tweak. Overall though the headphones are awesome. I prefer the cloth ear covers as they felt softer and more comfortable for me. Also it took a few days to be completely comfortable in them but now I can game for hours with no issues whatsoever and brilliant (tweaked) sound quality
customer_reviews.author: Thabs

customer_reviews.title: Amazing casual gamer headset
customer_reviews.text: Hi this is a really good decent priced heasdset for casual gaming! it works on most platforms and is really comfy! It comes with 2 ear cups for each ear and you can pick the one for your comfort. you can resive the headset by the adjustable thign on the side! You can play for many hours and not get any pains in any part of the head. i recommend this headset as its really affordable and 10 pounds cheaper on here than it is at my shop.
customer_reviews.author: F. R

customer_reviews.title: Made for gamers, not so much for music lovers
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is good enough for gaming, maybe not good enough for audiophiles. Very easy to set up to as no drivers required installing. Vey comfortable to wear too and you can change the cushion pads for different types of material. The microphone is detachable and has good sound quality. The only slight downside of it (for me), is that the treble is quite high. Thus is usually helpful in gaming but if you're listening to music it can hurt your ears a bit so I had to adjudt the equaliser for a bit. Other than that, a solid gaming headset.
customer_reviews.author: AJM

customer_reviews.title: Not for BIG HEADS
customer_reviews.text: This headset is really good. The build quality is excellent, sound quality is really good and mic is very very clear. I purchased two sets, one for myself and one for my daughter. She loves them, wears then all the time to game and chat to her friends on discord. I wore mine for 30 minutes and I had to take them off due to the discomfort they caused me. They were very tight on my head and I felt the cans were not encompassing my whole ear and this made my ear quite sore. So 4 stars is the score and would have been 5 if Kingston catered for the market with a larger head
customer_reviews.author: MBH

customer_reviews.title: but compared to all the other gaming headsets I've seen these are by far the best quality. They sound great
customer_reviews.text: These are for my son, but compared to all the other gaming headsets I've seen these are by far the best quality. They sound great, they are incredibly soft and comfortable, they come with velour pads and faux pig skin, so he will have velour in summer and the leather type in the winter. His voice is very clear through discord, but, one thing they could do is improve the pop filter on the boom mic, it lets through too much 'pop' it needs to be thicker or of a better more acoustically tuned absorbent material.
customer_reviews.author: robinson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, good quality, good sound.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong with it at all,no drivers needed, plug into usb & works immediately, great for music, gaming, discord, teamspeak etc, very comfortable, dampens outside room noise etc, I'm forever lifting one off my ear & saying "Pardon", been using them a few months now with no visable wear on the material at all anywhere, mic still holds it postion frimly, I'm happy with it, I've heard how clear I sound when using it too.
customer_reviews.author: shaun

customer_reviews.title: Best gaming headset used to date
customer_reviews.text: Owned a large number of expensive wireless headsets (due to flexibility to move and whatnot) but NOTHING compares to the quality of these headphones. So comfortable, amazing sound quality and they just work. Best purchase yet for my gaming rig. Go ahead and compare its reviews/specs against some of the best wireless headphones in a £150 price range.
customer_reviews.author: Mous

customer_reviews.title: Good quality headphones
customer_reviews.text: Bought one set about a year or so ago for my daughter, who wears them daily to work and play at the computer. They have outlasted all previous cheaper versions, microphone quality is good, comfortable to wear, keep outside noise out well. Bought another set last month for my other daughter when her 3rd pair of cheaper ones gave up. She is very pleased with the difference. Definitely worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The quality I've come to expect from HyperX
customer_reviews.text: The build quality is outstanding, extremely comfortable even after long gaming sessions. I use them for music when I'm working from home too, so sometimes it's 12hrs+. My only problem is the virtual surround sound isn't the best. I never use it. If you're buying for the 7.1 surround sound, I wouldn't bother - I wouldn't go for virtual surround sound at all, go for the real thing. However, if you want a rock solid set of headphones I couldn't recommend enough. Extremely happy with mine.
customer_reviews.author: Zero

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for gaming and music
customer_reviews.text: Good: comfortable ear cushions; good sound quality; long enough cable to be at least 1 meter away from a device; good microphone quality; all the components seem durable (no rattling or loose parts). Bad: can't control microphone volume via operating system (slider won't move), but I can use the volume control on the adapter (comes with the headset). Some games/interfaces provide a microphone volume slider anyway so this isn't a major problem.
customer_reviews.author: Archos 117

customer_reviews.title: still the best
customer_reviews.text: had my old pair since 2016, and despite horrific treatment they didn't break until the sound card gave up a few weeks ago. I'm certain that a replacement would have been easy and effective, however I felt like it was time to get a new pair. Owning these has ruined my ability to enjoy most other headphones as these are just more comfortable - by far the most important quality. sound quality and sound stage is both great - much better than for the average gaming headset, keeping up with headphones in the price range. microphone is reliable and excellent, just what I needed for working from home. highly recommend for anyone working/chilling/gaming from home during the current pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: Korbinian

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not much bass.Mic is low.
customer_reviews.text: The headset looks nice and very comfortable. The microphone is ok but not really loud and there's some small static sound in background when u talk. Look on YouTube for reviews of mic test. The sound quality is ehh. Ok the bass isn't there . I'm a guy who also listens to trap and house where I need the bass. It is there but not much. My Turtle Beach X12 is way punchier than these. But they are comfortable with the memory foam earcups.. I also don't know why. The packaging was different to mine than other videos I seen. Mine didn't have the writing of welcoming on the box inside.and the usb dongle was in the mesh bag.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan g.

customer_reviews.title: Best gaming headset I’ve had so far.
customer_reviews.text: I game on a toshiba gaming laptop and usually use it when I play LoL or Diablo. I found hyperX a lot better than my previous small SteelSeries headset. It’s very comfortable, I like that the cable is quite long and that mini control box is very useful. I have never used it for listening to music on any platform as I have a Bose headset for that purpose however I watched movies with hyperX and it’s surely a very good gaming headset!
customer_reviews.author: Nihan

customer_reviews.title: So I got this headset as I heard good information from the e-sports scene about this headset
customer_reviews.text: So I got this headset as I heard good information from the e-sports scene about this headset. At first it was perfect the 7.1 surround sound was odd different from the corsair but got use too. AFTER one month and some travel this headset wire has already went, I now need to pull the cable around it's self just to have sound in both ears. Because of the issue I am going back to corsair headsets as that lasted me years.
customer_reviews.author: Damian

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Headphone, great accessories. Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great headset with balanced sound and a fantastic quality mic. In the box it comes with a nifty adapter for the two prong airplane ports. A usb adapter is also included with controls mic sensitivity and headphones volume, as well as a button to activate surround sound. They even included additional foam cups for added comfort if desired. The box it comes in is gorgeous and the leather pouch to hold the headphones when not in use or for travel. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy McNamara

customer_reviews.title: After 2yrs
customer_reviews.text: This is still the best in my opinion. I bought it almost 2yrs ago and is still amazing. I play a lot CSGO and this is def one of the best out there for the price. Previously I owned Cloud I and it was amazing. Only downside is this trash braided cable - total pain if you ask me. Other than that perfection!
customer_reviews.author: KrissG

customer_reviews.title: exaclty what i wanted
customer_reviews.text: Have been a huge turtle beach fan for years, but started too notice the prices going up and the quality going down. And we all had a jag quite or drunken are too hell this with, only too find next day crap I need new headphones lol. Been gaming with these for a few months and a great bargain buy, all the extra FPS addon too more expensive headset seam a joke. As enjoyed many a FPS and not felt i was missing out with these bad boys. And can confirm arms are metal and and can see them lasting a very long time. Would happy buy again.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for gaming
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband a year ago and confirm he still loves them!! He had some headphones previously the year before that broke within a year so after a lot of research I chose these and he’s been so pleased with them. The sound quality is fab and they’re lasting really well!! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: quality headphones
customer_reviews.text: arrived in a1 condition, sound quality was excellent compared to my cheaper ones, good length on the cord, lovely design, not heavy, i will definitely recommend to all, i did watch youtube reviews, asked other gamers/streamers and they all said buy it
customer_reviews.author: trebor

customer_reviews.title: Have had 2 of these
customer_reviews.text: Undoubtedly the best sound quality in a gaming headset I've used. You will get a good 2 years use out of this with no complaints. Maintains quality longer than any other gaming headset I've used. After two years of heavy use the connections will begin to squeak, which is a lot longer than any other gaming headset I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: IMHO Possibly the best gaming headphones bar none.
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome, you have to see them and try them to believe the quality. By far the best headset I have bought, extremely comfortable, and the 7.1 surround sound is amazing, twice now I have jumped in Tamriel ESO when a character behind me has said "Hello" and for all the world it sounded just like they were over my shoulder!!!!!! I don't have a bad thing to say about them and the packaging is very high end, they look, sound and feel quality!! Especially good is the mic is removable, and you even get an adapter for the normal sound outputs if you are not using USB. They work great on my phone, laptop and sony Walkman.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: Had G933 before this and another logitech wireless before that. Both were riddled with connection issues and broke very quickly. This has faired well over the last 6 months and the sound quality if very close to the more expensive G933. Little less bass than id like.
customer_reviews.author: Gee Tee

customer_reviews.title: Very good headset
customer_reviews.text: A very comfortable headset, with quality sound, and decent-enough controls. I would certainly recommend it to anyone who wants to spend less than £100 on a headset. My only gripe is the cord: it likes to tangle itself. This minor gripe should highlight the limited flaws that I have found in my few months of usage.
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: 3 years later
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these in January 2016 and feel I can leave a review. By far the best headset I've had and in the 3 years these have been bashed by my two children. Audio sounds as good as day one and the mic is still crystal clear. Cannot recommend these enough, I'll be heartbroken the day I need to part with them, but I don't seeing this being anytime soon anyway!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great clear sound from the headphones with a good amount ...
customer_reviews.text: Great clear sound from the headphones with a good amount of noise reduction from the padding in the cans. Inline controls, for microphone and headphone volume and a hard switched microphone cutoff. The microphone is detachable, which was a pleasant surprise. Everything comes in a fancy presentation box, there's alternate foam pads if you don't like the leather effect ones and a cotton bag for storage. All the cords are heavy duty and braided , my only real gripes are that there is a bit of an over-abundance of lead, and the inline controller is by necessity of design quite far down the cord from the headset itself
customer_reviews.author: Frightful

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable with great audio
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to use for extended periods of time, you can chose from faux leather or alcantara for the lining with the later offering less isolation but better thermal insulation. Only thing that I had happen is the audio card stopped working after more than a year of switching the microphone off and on but that can be easily replaced. Sound quality is on par with audiophile sets that can set you back hundreds of pounds. Microphone is true to your voice with no distortion.
customer_reviews.author: Chisavu Alin Stefan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Really amazing quality product and packaging. Sound quality is great and surround sound, even though I barely use it, has helped in some occasions and is immersive. Microphone quality is also great and the included controller has all the controls u need. Only slight issue is there is a lot of sound bleeding and even at moderate volumes, it's sound can be heard in the same room.
customer_reviews.author: The222

customer_reviews.title: Superb Audio & Simple to Setup / Use
customer_reviews.text: They look great straight out of the box and have a really high quality feel & finish. The Mic pick up on Discord is perfect and the little sponge on the end of the Mic stops any "Mic Breathing" as me and my friends call it, And the best bit was there wasn't any annoying software to install as windows already has the drivers. The headphones are nice and loud and the 7.1 boost button the volume controller works really nicely on Music & especially in games, it adds a nice surround sound effect but i suppose that what 7.1 is supposed to do lol. Buy them their Great!.
customer_reviews.author: Tauly

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Easily the best headset I have owned and worth the extra bit of money compared to other headsets. My only gripe would be that I can't seem to locate a mute button on the headset but apart from that they are incredible. For games like counterstrike, the surround sound feature really comes in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Rick_421

customer_reviews.title: Decent budget headphones at non-budget price
customer_reviews.text: These are an ok first pair of gaming headphones, with decent sound and alright comfort. They aren't top-range however, and mine have a little play in the wire as it goes into the headphones which causes a very annoying sound whenever you move your head. Other than that I've been fairly happy with them, but they are pretty pricy being a mid-range product sold at the lower end of top-range product price. I'd recommend pushing the boat out a little further and purchasing a higher tier pair.
customer_reviews.author: Kanteri

customer_reviews.title: Good Gaming Headphone.
customer_reviews.text: Best gaming headphone ive own using previously turtle beach. Premium packaging, sound quality in gaming and music is really good, you can spot the difference compared to cheaper headphones. mic is clear and able to block background noise properly. used this playing GTA 5, Red dead 2, and other open world games and its breath taking. even when you use it for esport games while listening to music it can handle both without distortion and muddled sounds.
customer_reviews.author: K Dela Cruz

customer_reviews.title: The product itself is great - good sound
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great - good sound, comfortable etc.... but a word of warning: I initially received what looked like a refurbished or well-used pair, with scratches and small dents to the metal panels on the side of the cans and minor scratches/tears on the leather and rubber finishes. The cap for the mic port was missing, as was the headset storage bag. The cable was knotted up. The headset was fine, but clearly not in new condition. Requested replacement from amazon, arrived next day and the replacement was brand new - a biiig difference seeing them side by side. Great product, but don't settle for a repaired/refurbed/used set masquerading for new.
customer_reviews.author: discerningcustomer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable headset, bad mic quality and questionable mic attachment though
customer_reviews.text: Been using pretty much 12-16 hours a day since purchase (a month ago). Massively comfortable headband and earpads. Was easy to install drivers and the external sound card is easy to use. Cons: The 7.1 surround button on the sound card is absolute garbage, I would recommend never touching the sound card once you get it set up. The mic connector gets in the way and cant be moved out of your view without disconnecting it from the headset. My main gripe with this headset is that the mic input volume is horrifically low when first installed, and required a third-party program to up the boost volume. The mic quality isnt all that good either.
customer_reviews.author: Hobbit

customer_reviews.title: Faulty after 18 months
customer_reviews.text: Update - Microphone no longer works, product is useless.... Really good product for the money, well worth it on PC due to the 7.1 built in capabilities, I also use with my PSVR headset and they work great for immersion there - a bit "too" great for games like Resident Evil 7 !
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Professional GAMING headset...
customer_reviews.text: The title of this review is aimed at the microphone quality. This is a professional gaming headset, not for streaming and YouTube, anything to do with voice overs. The microphone quality is crap, mainly due to the USB connection. Therefore, i would 100% suggest you save up for a microphone like a Blue Snowball if you wish to stream with clear microphone quality.
customer_reviews.author: Stu Hub

customer_reviews.title: Product worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a reasonably priced pair of wired headphones so I can record gameplay as my more expensive Steelseries H Wireless wasn't great for that. I fell in love with them, the sound is clear, the artificial 7.2 is way better than then surround sound on the Steelseries H. They are really damn comfy even for continuous usage. Haven't touched my other headset, except to clean the dust hehe.
customer_reviews.author: Marko

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for several years now and if I lost or broke them, I'd buy another pair. The sound quality is truly great. The set and the accessories it comes with feel luxurious. Punches above its weight.
customer_reviews.author: The Acetone

customer_reviews.title: Noise is awful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these a week ago, and I'm sending them back The sound quality was great, the Mic was OK, but the noise (static) in the left ear when you moved the wire around just a bit really put me off. It is something you could probably get used too be I think at the price your paying you would expect there to be no problems right? I've purchased cloud alpha now to see if I get the same problem. If not it looks like alpha will be my new daily driver EDIT---------- Hyperx Cloud Alpha are absolutely amazing no static, great sound, nice Mic, it's so much more versatile. Twas a blessing in disguise
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: Extremely pleased with this product. Using the headset with my ps4 for a couple of months now and never had an issue with it. Really comfortable too even for long gaming sessions. The only thing I could come up with against it is the mic quality. It's not great but it's pretty average. Anyway for casual gaming this mic is perfect too and if You're serious about recording/broadcasting Your voice You should go with a standalone mic anyway.. Feels well put together as well and I like the aluminium frame too. Dropped / stepped on it plenty of times whitout causing any damage. Best headset in this pricerange by far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: £50 is a very good price for this gaming headset which is typically £75
customer_reviews.text: £50 is a very good price for this gaming headset which is typically £75. Reviews seem to say this is the best gaming headset under £100 so this price is a bargain. Well designed, nice touches like the controls for mike/earphones and 7.1 surround sound button are on the usb cable not the headset cable. Also like the way the microphone detaches so you can use it as a normal headphones without the mike getting in the way or damaged. Nice quality feel from the woven cable sleeve to the headband and even the packaging, a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wright

customer_reviews.title: The best headset I've ever had!
customer_reviews.text: Oh man! This headset is godlike! Everything about it is so good! The sound is great, 7.1 surround system is awesome, the microphone is quite good as well. You just need to plug this beast in and you're good to go. No need for any software. It feels so good on the head, you can wear this headset for hours. Everything for such a good price! I highly recommend this headset!
customer_reviews.author: Sorin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headset! (super comfy)
customer_reviews.text: I just received this headset from my girlfriend as a Christmas present. I have been blown away by the quality 7.1 surround sound audio while playing games on my laptop! It really does make games feel so much more immersive. Also I haven't found any issues with the comfort of the headset like many other reviews. I find them extremely comfortable and have had them on for 4 hour+ gaming sessions with no problem! Overall its a top quality gaming headset for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: jacob

customer_reviews.title: Great for music/chatting Bad for gaming (especially PUBG
customer_reviews.text: I learned the hard way. The external soundcard and "7.1" is a gimmick and actually harms the sound in games. Having to remove the soundcard and buy an extension lead and a 3.5mm female adapter to plug this straight into my motherboard, so we'll see how that works out, but the 7.1 is what you're essentially paying for here and you do NOT want this for games. Great for music/chatting Bad for gaming (especially PUBG, I've noticed nobody has mentioned this game specifically).
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my ten year old son to use with his PC and he is absolutely delighted. The sound great, feel high quality, and the packaging is beautiful. For the Boxing Day sale discounted price, these are a bargain. Update - they have a two year warranty. Two years and one month after I bought them the wire near the plug came a little loose and we started losing sound in the right cup. I contacted HyperX direct and even though it was outside of warranty they sent me a brand new pair the next day by UPS. Amazing! These are very comfortable headphones and the customer support is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Anthony W

customer_reviews.title: The best headphones i have ever used.
customer_reviews.text: Very good headphones. Very comfortable and great sound quality. Comes with ear cup replacements that are made of some sort of fabric. Leather and fabric are both comfortable, i prefer the fabric. Look very nice as well. Comes with many accessories and very cheap for what it is. I reccomend highly. Had my pair for a few month and haven't encountered any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Mahmud Turker

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones but quiet mic recording
customer_reviews.text: I use these for gaming on my PC and found them to be excellent at blocking out external noises and provide good sound quality. I love that the microphone is removable when not needed, however it doesn't seem to pick up sound very well; the sound seems to be okay but very quiet regardless of how close the mic is to my mouth. Aside from the mic volume, I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Violet binks

customer_reviews.title: Overall great headset
customer_reviews.text: First time buying hyperx and I was pleasantly surprised. Great form factor, not too big or bulky, amazing comfort, 2 options of ear cups (leather and suede like). Very pleased with sound quality , clear input.
customer_reviews.author: Man_lag

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and quality is far improved over my old Sennheiser headset. Microphone picks up far less background noise, I couldn't recommend this headset enough! Only slight downside for me is the position of the in-line volume control, which can get in the way on occasion especially if you clip it to your clothes as the design suggests - with the result I broke the clip after forgetting it was there!
customer_reviews.author: Ad

customer_reviews.title: Really comfy headset
customer_reviews.text: I got this headset after reading steller reviews of it online. As it is it doesn't live up to the hype. That being said it is a very comfy headset so I will trade comfiness over noise isolation. Pros: Comfy as hell, sits on my head with tons of room to spare, the ear muffs do not squeeze my head but rather sit around my ears. The mic is detachable. It picks up well. Cons: The noise isolation is not amazing. I was lead to believe it was. Still decent though so thats why 4 stars. The surround sound is a joke.
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: I mostly liked this headset
customer_reviews.text: I mostly liked this headset, it's easily good as anything else you'll get at this price, study seeming with a nice mic and very clear audio, and being it's own USB device has advantages, however onboard sound was rendered useless by this fact, and the headphones do not come with a cable to use stand alone with another sound card, pretty sure an adaptor could solve this. However the band has somehow caused quite severe irritation of my scalp (I shave my head so the material was in contact) which is very disappointing, my Senns do not do this, so I've had to return them. So 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Ballard

customer_reviews.text: Expected more... spent time changing firm ware and messing around with settings.. mic is still fuzzy/static and whatever else no matter what i do.. takes the piss really considering price and company. should be plug in and play. kind of want to send back but its such a hassle right now.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have used it for around a year and it has and still is serving me great. Due to its string metal frame even multiple drops hasn't done any damage to the headphone. My only complaint is that my phone won't recognize the headphone without the mic which restricts me from using it outside however if you don't care about how others think about you go ahead.
customer_reviews.author: Ibrahim

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset, Great Quality At A Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headset in December 2016 and I am still using them today. They are extremely robust and can take a beating be it via being dropped, thrown or travelled with this headset will survive it all. The audio quality is perfect and I have never had any issues with how these headphones sound same can be said about the microphone, great quality and it's detachable. Overall just a perfectly well rounded and well made headset that surpasses many other "Gaming Headsets"
customer_reviews.author: George Needham

customer_reviews.title: Like having 2 clouds pressed against your ears. Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Ever wondered what it would be like having 2 clouds pressing against your ears? Well this is your fantasy coming true. The memory foam in these headphones makes them an absolute delight to wear! The only problem is, that I never want to take them off. They worked with no issues on my Lenovo gaming laptop, Windows 10. The sound is clear, the little sound controller is so handy for adjusting game / mic volume on the fly. I had the Corsair H200s and these are wayyyyyy comfier and overall just better quality. Definitely get these over the H200s! Believe me!
customer_reviews.author: Seamus Barcoe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Headset!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this headset every single day for the past 6 months and I am more than impressed. It has amazing sound quality and the surround sound mode works great with watching movies and playing games! The build quality is really high quality and it comes with a set of different ear cuffs so you can switch them to your liking and comfort. It's microphone is also great sounding and detachable, making this headset usable outdoors as well. I highly recommend this Headset for either Gaming or Plain Entertainment.
customer_reviews.author: Constantinos

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic sound from music and games. Noise cancelling is amazing my friends can't hear what I play/listen to no matter how loud. Very comfortable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: scarborough9

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

I can remove the mic part in care it ever breaks i dont need to buy the whole headset.I used the headset for 8 hours straight when gaming and its comfy. customer_reviews.author: Edgars

customer_reviews.title: Good quality sound for the money and deep bass
customer_reviews.text: Good quality sound for the money and deep bass. Directional sound is brilliant and mic is passable. So for that reason I'd avoid them. If the USB sound card didn't keep breaking I'd give them 4 stars but I'm afraid this gives them a two 2 reduction. Hopefully the Cloud III won't have this problem or they'll do a product recall giving everyone non faulty sound cards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5/5 Headset
customer_reviews.text: Love this headset. Mic is alright, sometimes quiet and fiddly if not configured right. It feels really comfortable on the head, and the sound quality is amazing. This headset will always have a special place for me. Also, the HyperX support team is probably the best in the world, no exaggeration. The headset is covered under two years warranty and they helped me insanely quickly.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable headset, great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with this. Very comfortable headset to use during hours of gaming. Microphone is great quality and easy to adjust. The 7.1 surround sound is fantastic when gaming, you can literally hear every little background noise, it makes gaming that much more enjoyable. Would highly recommend this headset for people who enjoy gaming!

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones... But...

customer_reviews.title: I used them for more than 2 years

First off very impressed with the packaging and the extras that come with it. Delighted with the performance far better than other makes he has tried. customer_reviews.author: MollyMax

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and sound

customer_reviews.text: The perfect headphones. Mic is crystal clear and the audio is very good. They are very comfortable to wear even for several hours. Once you put them on and start playing, you wont hear a pip. The mic is detachable, so if you don't use it, take it off and put it away.

product_meta.title: HyperX Cloud II 7.1 Virtual Surround Sound Gaming Headset with Advanced USB Audio Control Box - Red
product_meta.description:
HyperX Cloud II Manual: HyperX_Cloud_II_Manual_EN.pdf

HyperX Cloud II features a redesigned USB sound card audio control box that amplifies audio and voice for an optimal Hi-Fi gaming experience, so you can hear what you've been missing. Open up a world of detail that other gamers will never know - the rustle of a camper's boot, the scuttle in a distant vent. Its independent audio and microphone volume control lets you adjust not only sound volume but also mic volume and easily toggle Surround Sound 7.1 or the mic sound on and off. This next-generation headset generates virtual 7.1 surround sound with distance and depth to enhance your gaming, movie or music experience. Pinpoint your opponents'location in the game and strike before he sees you coming. It's hardware driven and plug and play, with no driver needed. 

HyperX Cloud II has a digitally enhanced, noise-cancelling microphone with automatic gain control functionality and echo cancellation enabled through the USB sound card. The provides clearer voice quality and reduced background noise, with voice volume automatically increasing as in-game sound gets louder, to optimise team communication and in-game chat in intense battles. HyperX Cloud II is certified by TeamSpeak and optimised for Skype and other leading chat programs.

HyperX Cloud II is Hi-Fi capable, with 53mm drivers for superior audio performance and rich sound quality with crystal-clear low, mid and high tones and enhanced bass via the sound card. Pro-gaming optimised, HyperX Cloud II is USB-powered for PCs and Macs and 3.5mm stereo-compatible for PS4 and Xbox One.1 Its closed-cup design helps with noise cancellation in gaming tournaments and other loud environments so players can obliterate the enemy in peace.
